en-US.set more currencies tip: We have developed the most suitable pricing options based on the currencies of different mainstream countries and regions.

en-US.pay success tip:
The receipt  has been sent to the email address filled in.

en-US.click to billing: Click to the Billing Management page
en-US.subscription expired tip: The date on which the currently active subscription expires and will automatically renew upon expiration if not cancelled
en-US.name: Name
en-US.payouts instructions content:
1. After applying for cash payout, we will arrange a professional financial team to review, and the review and transfer will be completed within 3 to 7 working days. The specific arrival date varies according to each bank, and generally arrives within 7 working days.
2. Please make sure that the payout information you fill in is correct, and the payment cannot be reversed.
3. The minimum amount for each withdrawal is 100 US dollars, and the amount of each withdrawal is an integer multiple of 100 US dollars. When payouting, we support US dollar and CNY accounts. If you choose CNY, we will calculate the corresponding transfer amount according to the exchange rate at the time of withdrawal .
4. We currently support mainland China bank cards, Hong Kong bank cards, and Singapore bank cards, and the wallet supports PayPal and Payoneer
en-US.approved tip: Payment transferred, please check and confirm.
en-US.your name tip: Please fill in your real name, wrong name may lead to payout failure
en-US.transfer currency tip: The amount of each Payout is an integral multiple of US$ 100
en-US.apply payout tip: Funds will be deposited directly into this account and cannot be returned. Please confirm that the account information is correct.
en-US.calculate by rate: Automatically calculated base on the current exchange rage
en-US.4 steps to start: 4 steps to start accepting subscription payments
en-US.browser not support: Your browser does not support automatic copying, please copy manually
en-US.1-100 characters required: Character length must be between 1 and 100.

en-US.Explanation: Each plugin requires a uniq: Explanation: Each plugin requires a unique key for validation. By clicking 'Save,' we will automatically generate a key for the plugin. This key will be used for validation and synchronization in the future. For further details, please refer to the
en-US.1. When developers have their own user l: 1. When developers have their own user login and account system, user sync helps to synchronize Kodepay's user payment-related information to the developer's own account system, completing the binding process.
en-US.2. Each plugin requires a unique key for: 2. Each plugin requires a unique key for validation. Before starting, please generate a key for the respective plugin. For more details, please refer to the
en-US.delete tip: Irreversible action: Once deleted, it cannot be recovered. If needed, you can re-add it. Are you sure you want to delete it?

You have successfully subscribed to plan {prod_name} on {date} and it is in effect, please check if you want to subscribe again.
Please contact us if you have any questions.

en-US.If no extension is selected, you will re: If no extension is selected, you will receive event callbacks for all extensions under the account
en-US.This operation will cancel the subscript: This operation will cancel the subscription. Do you want to proceed?
en-US.The payout amount is rounded up for ease: The payout amount is rounded up for ease of calculation and financial processing. The remaining amount will be accumulated in subsequent withdrawals.

zh-CN.Please use Google One-Click Login in xxx: 请在{seconds}秒后使用Google一键登录
zh-CN.Another user has logged into this accoun: 有其他人于{off_line_timestamp}登录该账号，本设备已经下线
zh-CN.Allow the number of simultaneous logins: 允许同一个账号在不同设备上同时登录在线使用的数量
zh-CN.The payout amount is rounded up for ease: 为了方便计算和财务处理，提现时的金额会进行取整。剩余金额会累积到后续的提现当中。
zh-CN.This operation will cancel the subscript: 此操作将会取消该订阅，是否继续？
zh-CN.If no extension is selected, you will re: 如果不选择插件，则会收到账号下所有插件的事件回调
zh-CN.Daily subscription is for testing purpos: 天级订阅仅供测试环境用来调试

如有疑问请联系开发者。

zh-CN.1. When developers have their own user l: 1. 当开发者拥有自己的用户登录和账号系统时，用户同步帮助用户把Kodepay的用户支付相关信息同步给开发者自己的账户系统当中，完成绑定
zh-CN.Explanation: Each plugin requires a uniq: 说明：每个插件需要一个单独的key来进行校验，点击添加我们会自动生成一个插件key，以供后续校验同步使用。如需了解更多，请查阅
zh-CN.Select Plugin for Create Sym Key: 选择一个插件来创建你的sym-key
zh-CN.Please enter a name for self-identificat: 请输入名称，以便自己识别
zh-CN.The balance refers to the amount remaini: 开发者的订单收入扣除手续费用、退款、争议费用后剩余的金额
zh-CN.Payout amount refers to the balance that: 订单完成14天以后余额可提现

zh-CN.validate email: 请输入正确的邮箱地址
zh-CN.Integration successful: 接入成功，您的插件现在已经拥有完整的支付功能了!
zh-CN.Select the Subscription Plans to Add: 选择要添加的付费计划
zh-CN.browser not support: 您的浏览器不支持自动复制，请手动复制
zh-CN.apply payout tip: 资金将直接打入该账户，无法退回。请确认账户信息正确
zh-CN.transfer currency tip: 每次提现的额度为US$ 100的整数倍
zh-CN.your name tip: 请填写真实姓名，错误的姓名可能导致提现失败
zh-CN.payouts instructions content:
1. 申请提现后，我们会安排专业的财务团队进行审核，3~7个工作日内会完成审核和打款操作，具体到账日期根据各个银行不等一般7个工作日内到账。
2. 请确保你填写的提现信息正确，打款后不可撤销。
3. 每次提现的最小额度为100美元，并且每次提现的金额为100美元的整数倍，提现时我们支持美金和人民币账户，如选择人民币我们会按照提现时的汇率计算出对应的转账金额。
4. 我们当前支持中国大陆银行卡、香港银行卡、新加坡银行卡，钱包支持PayPal和Payoneer。
zh-CN.payout 30 days tip: 每30天可以进行一次提现
zh-CN.name: 名称
zh-CN.plan description placeholder: 请输入简短描述，用于账单和发票内描述说明
zh-CN.recurring monthly: 订阅 每月循环支付
zh-CN.all prices are tax inclusive: 所有价格均为含税价格
zh-CN.set more currencies tip: 我们根据各个不同主流国家地区的币种，制定了最合适的价格选择
zh-CN.plan update tip: 价格、计费方式提交,生效后无法修改
zh-CN.email format error: 邮箱格式不正确，请重新输入
zh-CN.send email to login: 我们会向该邮箱发送一封验证邮件，请登录该邮箱并点击验证链接以激活登录
zh-CN.email sent: 已经向{input}邮箱发送一封验证邮件，请登录该邮箱并点击验证按钮以激活，邮件有效期5分钟

zh-CN.mail not received: 未收到邮件？请检查邮件垃圾箱或推广邮件文件夹。
zh-CN.pay success tip:
账单发送至填写的邮箱，请注意查收。
后续可通过该邮箱来验证身份，
